archimate:BusinessObject.name: ServiceSpecCharacteristic
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
This is an abstract base class that represents the key features of this ServiceSpecification. For example, bandwidth is characteristic of many different types of services; if bandwidth is important (e.g., from the point-of-view of a Customer obtaining this Service via a Product) then bandwidth would be a ServiceCharacteristic for that particular Service.
Note that in this example, bandwidth would have to be defined as an invariant feature that multiple Services use. Otherwise, it should be defined as a ServiceCharacteristic.
